name: ASTERIA Variation No.1 (SOUND ON!)
description: ASTERIA is the Titan goddess of falling stars and nighttime divinations. watch her lying amongst the stars of the universe, in this galaxy or another ✦✦✦ this animation is consisting of one single unbroken line and the music was created specifically to fit the line development by composer Gilles Wollenmann | twitter @G_Wollenmann ✦✦✦ 8 Variations of Asteria – Edition of 30 for each | .mp4 | 1372x1920 | 30fps | 27 seconds | 8,6 MB | full personal rights ✦✦✦ Artist – AWi Anna Willa | www.annawilla-art.ch | twitter @annawilla_AWi
